title: Smoked salmon and blue cheese pizza
ingredients: ['80g tomato puree', '1 tablespoon prepared mustard', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'basil, to taste', 'oregano, to taste', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 ready made pizza dough', '150g smoked salmon, diced', '200g blue cheese, diced', '1 tomato, peeled and sliced', '150g grated cheese']
